ygData.subject: Re: Kill Stealing
ygData.msgSnippet: The best way I have found to prevent KS ers is to play dead. Being a Monk, I have the ability to play dead. So when those nasty Wiz s come forth and nuke a MOB
ygData.messageBody:
The best way I have found to prevent KS'ers is to play dead. Being a Monk, I
have the ability to play dead. So when those nasty Wiz's come forth and nuke
a MOB I'm on, I just Feign Death (if Im in a party I tell them to back off).
Presto! The MOB ignores me and chases that Wiz down. It's fun to watch them
go from nuker to ROOT'er. Hehe. Usually the would be KS'er leaves.

The life of a Monk is sooo much fun.

Axlon Stormbringer
29 Seasons of Monkdom - Karana
